Features.title: Send to any valid whatsapp number
Features.text: Send messages to any valid whatsapp number even withou saving to contacts

Features.title: Send plain messages or messages with image
Features.text: Send plain text messages or text messasges with image.

Features.title: Easy access to send API
Features.text: API provided can be consumed from any browser or your own created web application/site.

Features.title: Can be easily integrated into Google Sheets
Features.text: Integrate API into Google sheets for faster and easy use.
